title: Create surreal Pokémon lookalikes of Jeff Bezos, The Rock and more with AI
description: Wordle, The Rock and Rembrandt's "The Return of the Prodigal Son" Pokémon: I choose you!

title: Google will shut down Stadia, its video game streaming service
description: The company will refund users who bought Stadia hardware or purchased games for the platform.

title: How to scrub your phone number and address from Google search
description: Here's how to remove your phone number, physical address and email address from Google search results.
